alert.note: Alert for Dakota; Ramsey (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 13 at 10:05PM CDT until July 14 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL DAKOTA AND SOUTHEASTERN RAMSEY COUNTIES... At 1003 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Woodbury, or 7 miles east of St. Paul, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Minneapolis St. Paul International Airport reported a 60 mph gust around 955 PM. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... St. Paul, Eagan, Maplewood, Inver Grove Heights, Roseville, White Bear Lake, South St. Paul, West St. Paul, Vadnais Heights, Mendota Heights, North St. Paul and Little Canada. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
